name: Swip Flitch
description:
This is a 2D Puzzle Platformer prototype developed by a team of 4 game-dev students and 1 engineering student over a weekend for a Game Jam at Stockholm University!

Game Jam theme: "Flip the switch!"

Contributors:

Hannes Lenberg

Ivar Källström

Ludvig Burud

Sarah Abbas Jawad

Özge Alkan

!!!ALL ASSETS, SCRIPTS, MUSIC, ETC. ARE ORIGINAL CREATIONS BY US!!!

Controls:

A/D or left/righ - move on the X-axis

Space - Jump
